nodes.text: JH-101 was a stormtrooper of the Galactic Empire.

Following the battle of Yavin IV, resulting the destruction of Death Star I, JH-101 resided in the Imperial Detainment Facility in the Imperial Fortress on Yavin 4. In this facility, the Empire imprisoned six Rebel pilots. During the Remembrance Day festivities of that year, Wedge Antilles employed a loyal Rebel to rescue the pilots. The Rebel killed JH-101 so that one of the Rebel pilots could sneak out of the base in his stormtrooper armor.

JH-101 appeared as a non-player character in the video game Star Wars Galaxies, a massively multiplayer online-role playing game developed by Sony Online Entertainment and published by LucasArts, prior to its closure on December 15, 2011.
